Programa de Integración Socio Urbana
Social and Urban Integration Program

description.narrative: Promote social and urban integration of the country's vulnerable neighborhoods, prioritizing those included in the National Registry of Informal Neighborhoods (RENABAP).
Promover la integración social y urbana de los barrios vulnerables del país, priorizando aquellos comprendidos dentro del Registro Nacional de Barrios Populares (RENABAP).
Commitment in second quarter of 2019
Disbursement in first quarter of 2021
Disbursement in third quarter of 2021
Interest repayment in first quarter of 2022
Interest repayment in third quarter of 2021
